thread.title: Karen Fletcher
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Karen Fletcher

author: Karen Fletcher
title: Karen Fletcher
text: Contacting and arranging my MOT via Service Stop was the smoothest process! They collected my car from work with plenty of communication and there was no hassel at all. My car was returned in good time with all of the required paperwork. I will definately recommend to all my friends and family.
